title: Double lemon layer cake
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '300g caster sugar', '115g butter', '3 eggs', '225ml buttermilk', '2 tablespoons lemon zest', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', 'Filling', '450ml whipping cream, chilled', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '240g lemon curd']
